channel.title: Side Hustles on Eddie Abbondanzio
channel.description: Recent content in Side Hustles on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: How I Launched 3 Products and Didn't Become the Next Jeff Bezos
item.description: In the past ~12 months there's only been about a couple weeks where I didn't have some kind of side project I was working on. I'm just a very hands on person who loves working on projects and code feels like the perfect medium. Best of all it's almost free to produce and when you mess up you're not out a lot of money vs other hobbies like woodworking. But code has been more than a hobby for me.
